live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 14:17 CT.
61464.summary: Some customers in the Willowgrove area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
61464.title: May 23 - Saskatoon (Willowgrove) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
